oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ʻAdad mā fī al-kitāb al-ʻazīz min al-āyāt ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam : manuscript, undated
ʻAdad āyāt kitāb Allāh
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبه نستعين عدد ما في الكتاب العزيز ... :Incipit
Oriental paper. 17,7 x 13 cm. (11,5 x 8,5 cm.)
Bound in pasteboards covered in marble paper with dark brown leather on spine.
Written in one column, in a nastaʻlīq script in black ink, rubricated in red, 13 lines per page, with marginal corrections. Catchwords on the verso of each leaf.

With: Adab al-kātib / li-al-Shaykh ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Sakhāwī (ff. 1r-29r) ; Dhikr maʻrifat aḥzāb al-Qurʼān wa-anṣāfihi wa-arbāʻih / li-al-Shaykh ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Sakhāwī (ff. 32r-36v) ; Makhārij al-ḥurūf / li-Abī Muḥammad Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jaʻbarī (ff. 37r-40r).
MS Arab 379. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hermeneutics
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: عدد ما في الكتاب العزيز من الآيات على حروف المعجم : مخطوطة، undated
عدد آيات كتاب الله
